results.title: The role of autophagy in SIM mediated anti-inflammatory osteoclastogenesis through NLRP3 signaling pathway
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@SIM@@@ may reduce autophagy secretion to attenuate @CHEMICAL_Lipopolysaccharides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008070 @@@LPS@@@-induced osteoclastogenesis and the @GENE_NLRP3 @GENE_216799 @@@NLRP3@@@ signaling pathway participates in this process, thus providing theoretical basis for the application of this drug in @<m>DISEASE_Peri_Implantitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057873 @@@peri-implantitis@@@.

citations.NLM: Cheng Y, Jin W, Zheng L, Huang X, Luo S, Hong W, Liao J, Samruajbenjakun B, Leethanakul C. The role of autophagy in SIM mediated anti-inflammatory osteoclastogenesis through NLRP3 signaling pathway Immun Inflamm Dis. 2024 Jan;12(1):e1145. PMID: 38270300
citations.BibTeX: @article{38270300, title={The role of autophagy in SIM mediated anti-inflammatory osteoclastogenesis through NLRP3 signaling pathway}, author={Cheng Y and Jin W and Zheng L and Huang X and Luo S and Hong W and Liao J and Samruajbenjakun B and Leethanakul C}, journal={Immun Inflamm Dis}, volume={12}, number={1}, pages={e1145}}

results.title: Statins inhibit monocyte chemotactic protein 1 expression in endometriosis.
results.text_hl: In @SPECIES_10090 @@@mouse@@@ model, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ decreased @GENE_CCL2 @GENE_20296 @@@MCP-1@@@ expression in a dose-dependent manner in @<m>DISEASE_Peri_Implantitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057873 @@@endometriotic implants@@@ (P < .05).

citations.NLM: Cakmak H, Basar M, Seval-Celik Y, Osteen KG, Duleba AJ, Taylor HS, Lockwood CJ, Arici A. Statins inhibit monocyte chemotactic protein 1 expression in endometriosis. Reprod Sci. 2012 Jun;19(6):572-9. PMID: 22267540
citations.BibTeX: @article{22267540, title={Statins inhibit monocyte chemotactic protein 1 expression in endometriosis.}, author={Cakmak H and Basar M and Seval-Celik Y and Osteen KG and Duleba AJ and Taylor HS and Lockwood CJ and Arici A}, journal={Reprod Sci}, volume={19}, number={6}, pages={572-9}}
